name: warp-sql-server-mcp
description: Secure MCP server for connecting Warp to SQL Server with graduated safety levels and comprehensive database operations

scripts.test:integration: echo 'Run integration tests manually: node test/integration/test-aws-secrets.js'
scripts.test:manual:all: echo '🧪 Running all manual integration tests...' && npm run test:manual:phase1 && npm run test:manual:phase2 && npm run test:manual:phase3
scripts.test:manual:phase1:
echo '
🔒 Phase 1: Read-Only Security Testing...' && node test/integration/manual/phase1-readonly-security.test.js
scripts.test:manual:phase2:
echo '
⚠️  Phase 2: DML Operations Testing...' && node test/integration/manual/phase2-dml-operations.test.js
scripts.test:manual:phase3:
echo '
🛠️  Phase 3: DDL Operations Testing...' && node test/integration/manual/phase3-ddl-operations.test.js
scripts.test:protocol:
echo '
📡 MCP Protocol Smoke Test...' && node test/protocol/mcp-client-smoke-test.js
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:extract && npm run docs:generate-tools && npm run docs:generate-landing
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run markdown:lint && npm test
scripts.prepush: npm run precommit && npm run security:audit
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run markdown:lint && npm run links:check:ci && npm run test:coverage && npm run security:audit

author: Eduardo Garcia
